TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 在頁面剖析期間評估運算式。

span.span: Evaluates expressions during page parsing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別，針對 運算式產生器，例如類別，在頁面剖析期間所建立的程式碼運算式。The class is the base class for expression builders, such as the class, that create code expressions during page parsing. 運算式產生器會剖析宣告式的運算式，並建立程式碼來擷取繫結至的控制項屬性的值。Expression builders parse declarative expressions and create code to retrieve values bound to a control property. 在無編譯的情況下，運算式產生器可支援無編譯功能會計算在執行階段期間的運算式。In no-compile scenarios, an expression builder that supports a no-compile feature evaluates the expression during run time. 當頁面剖析器遇到分隔的字串運算式`<%$ %>`，它會建立為運算式中字串的前置詞為基礎的運算式產生器。When the page parser encounters an expression that is delimited with the string `<%$ %>`, it creates an expression builder for the expression based on the prefix in the string. 首碼是字串的冒號 （:） 左邊部分。The prefix is the portion of the string that is to the left of the colon (:). 例如，當剖析器遇到字串時，才`<%$ ConnectionStrings:MessageDB %>`，它會建立物件。For example, when the parser encounters the string `<%$ ConnectionStrings:MessageDB %>`, it creates a object. 前置詞是在 Web.config 檔案中的運算式產生器相關聯一節。Prefixes are associated with expression builders in the Web.config file in the section. 宣告運算式右側會傳遞給運算式產生器中，進行評估。The right side of the declarative expression is passed to the expression builder for evaluation. 覆寫方法產生程式碼，將編譯的網頁。Override the method to generate code that will be compiled with the page. 如果您想要使用未編譯的頁面上的自訂運算式產生器，您也必須覆寫方法，以傳回物件，表示運算式的結果。If you want the custom expression builder to be active on pages that are not compiled, you must also override the method to return an object that represents the results of the expression. 您也必須覆寫屬性來表示自訂運算式產生器並支援無編譯頁面。You also must override the property to indicate that the custom expression builder does support no-compile pages. 您可以定義一組屬性和方法來選取及評估運算式所關聯的控制項屬性在設計階段藉由實作一個運算式編輯器。You can define a set of properties and methods for selecting and evaluating an expression that is associated with a control property at design time by implementing an expression editor. 編輯器會標示在 運算式產生器，透過類別層級的中繼資料。The editor is marked on the expression builder through class-level metadata. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建置自訂運算式產生器藉由實作抽象類別。The following code examples demonstrate how to build a custom expression builder by implementing the abstract class. 這個實作傳回傳遞給運算式評估陳述式。This implementation of returns an evaluated statement that is passed to the expression. 若要執行此範例中，您必須先在 web.config 中註冊自訂運算式產生器。To run this example, you must first register the custom expression builder in the Web.config file. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何在 web.config 中註冊自訂運算式產生器。The first code example demonstrates how to register the custom expression builder in the Web.config file. ``` ``` 第二個程式碼範例示範如何參考.aspx 檔案中的運算式。The second code example demonstrates how to reference the expression in an .aspx file. ``` ``` 第三個程式碼範例示範如何開發自訂的運算式產生器藉由衍生自。The third code example demonstrates how to develop a customized expression builder by deriving from . 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須將類別放在 App_Code 資料夾中。To run this code example, you must place the class in the App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder/CS/MyExpressionBuilder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder/VB/MyExpressionBuilder.vb#1)]

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法。
When you inherit from the class, you must override the method.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立的執行個體直接透過使用建構函式。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of directly by using the constructor.

span.para: 當衍生自類別中覆寫建構函式來實作您的運算式產生器實作的自訂初始化動作。
When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your expression builder implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要您為作用中支援無編譯功能，在頁面上的物件可以覆寫方法和屬性。If you want your object to be active on a page that supports the no-compile feature, you can override the method and the property. 方法應該會傳回目前的運算式的評估。The method should return the evaluation of the current expression. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用覆寫方法來傳回評估的運算式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the overridden method to return an evaluated expression. If you override the method, you must also override the property.

If you implement a custom expression builder, you must perform the proper type casting for the control property and return the cast operation in the object.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value indicating whether the current object supports no-compile pages.

span.span: if the supports expression evaluation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 若要支援無編譯頁面，您必須同時覆寫方法和屬性。To support no-compile pages, you must override both the method and the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property.
